constantValues: Line item in a contract that specifies the type of service a customer is entitled to.

members.name: contractDetailId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the contract line.

members.description: Unique identifier of the contract line.

members.name: title

constantValues: Type a title or name that describes the contract line.

members.description: Type a title or name that describes the contract line.

members.name: activeOn

constantValues: Enter the date when the contract line becomes active.

members.description: Enter the date when the contract line becomes active.

members.name: allotmentsOverage

constantValues: Shows the number of minutes over the Total Allotments field that have been spent on resolved cases related to the contract line.

members.description: Shows the number of minutes over the Total Allotments field that have been spent on resolved cases related to the contract line.

members.name: allotmentsRemaining

constantValues: Shows the number of cases or minutes remaining, based on the resolved cases logged to the contract line.

members.description: Shows the number of cases or minutes remaining, based on the resolved cases logged to the contract line.

members.name: allotmentsUsed

constantValues: Shows the number of cases or minutes used in the resolved cases on the contract line.

members.description: Shows the number of cases or minutes used in the resolved cases on the contract line.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier of the contract associated with the contract line.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the contract associated with the contract line.

members.name: contractStateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.description: Status of the contract.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'contractStateCode_display' is added to the 'ContractLine' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'contractStateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: contractStateCode_display

members.name: discount

constantValues: Type the discount amount for the contract line to deduct any negotiated or other savings from the net amount due.

members.description: Type the discount amount for the contract line to deduct any negotiated or other savings from the net amount due.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.name: discountBase

constantValues: Value of the Discount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Discount in base currency.

members.name: discountPercentage

constantValues: Type the discount rate that should be applied to the Total Price, for use in calculating the net amount due for the contract line.

members.description: Type the discount rate that should be applied to the Total Price, for use in calculating the net amount due for the contract line.

members.name: effectivityCalendar

constantValues: Days of the week and times for which the contract line item is effective.

members.description: Days of the week and times for which the contract line item is effective.

members.name: expiresOn

constantValues: Enter the date when the contract line expires. The date is automatically filled with the contract date, but you can change it if required.

members.description: Enter the date when the contract line expires. The date is automatically filled with the contract date, but you can change it if required.

members.name: initialQuantity

constantValues: Type the number of units of the specified product or service that are eligible for support on the contract line.

members.description: Type the number of units of the specified product or service that are eligible for support on the contract line.

members.name: lineItemOrder

constantValues: Type the line item number for the contract line to easily identify the contract line and make sure it's listed in the correct order in the parent contract.

members.description: Type the line item number for the contract line to easily identify the contract line and make sure it's listed in the correct order in the parent contract.

members.name: net

constantValues: Shows the total charge to the customer for the contract line, calculated as the Total Price minus any discounts.

members.description: Shows the total charge to the customer for the contract line, calculated as the Total Price minus any discounts.

members.name: netBase

constantValues: Value of the Net in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Net in base currency.

members.name: price

constantValues: Type the total service charge for the contract line before any discounts are credited.

members.description: Type the total service charge for the contract line before any discounts are credited.

members.name: priceBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Price in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Price in base currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the product that is eligible for services on the contract line.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the product that is eligible for services on the contract line.

members.name: productSerialNumber

constantValues: Type the serial number for the product that is eligible for services on the contract line.

members.description: Type the serial number for the product that is eligible for services on the contract line.

members.name: rate

constantValues: Shows the cost per case or minute, calculated by dividing the Total Price value by the total number of cases or minutes allocated to the contract line.

members.description: Shows the cost per case or minute, calculated by dividing the Total Price value by the total number of cases or minutes allocated to the contract line.

members.name: rateBase

constantValues: Value of the Rate in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Rate in base currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: serviceAddress

constantValues: Choose the address for the customer account or contact where the services are provided.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the address for the customer account or contact where the services are provided.

members.name: serviceContractUnitsCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Select the unit type allotted in the contract line, such as cases or minutes, to determine the level of support.

members.description: Select the unit type allotted in the contract line, such as cases or minutes, to determine the level of support.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'serviceContractUnitsCode_display' is added to the 'ContractLine' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'serviceContractUnitsCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: serviceContractUnitsCode_display

members.name: stateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows whether the contract line is existing, renewed, canceled, or expired. You can't edit a contract line after it is saved, regardless of the status.

members.description: Shows whether the contract line is existing, renewed, canceled, or expired. You can't edit a contract line after it is saved, regardless of the status.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'ContractLine' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.name: statusCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

members.description: Select the contract line's status.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'ContractLine' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.name: totalAllotments

constantValues: Type the total number of minutes or cases allowed for the contract line.

members.description: Type the total number of minutes or cases allowed for the contract line.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the unit of measurement for the base unit quantity for this purchase, such as each or dozen.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the unit of measurement for the base unit quantity for this purchase, such as each or dozen.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier of the unit group associated with the contract line.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the unit group associated with the contract line.

members.name: accountId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the account with which the contract is associated.

members.description: Unique identifier of the account with which the contract is associated.

members.name: contactId

constantValues: Unique identifier for the contact associated with the contract line.

members.description: Unique identifier for the contact associated with the contract line.

definitions.description: Line item in a contract that specifies the type of service a customer is entitled to.
